summary: A test suite that verifies the correctness of a directory merging operation across various edge cases, such as merging into an empty destination, handling nested structures, merging when the destination already contains files, preventing merges that would traverse into a parent directory, and dealing with identical source and destination paths.
business_intent: To ensure that the directory merge functionality works reliably in production environments, preventing data loss, duplication, or permission errors when consolidating file system hierarchies.
